name: usm.io
description: Renders User Story Maps from XML to SVG.

scripts.start: echo NOTE: If no USM is showing up, run [ $ npm run build ] first! && echo && node index.js --port 8080
scripts.build: webpack --config webpack.config.js && mkdir -p web/3rdparty/usm.io && cp -rf dist/usmio.min.js web/3rdparty/usm.io/usmio.min.js

author: Frederik S. Held (kontakt@frederikheld.de)
